ing: salt and ground black pepper to taste
des: "A refreshing summer salad that is bit more substantial than a greens-based salad.  It is unparalleled for taking advantage of the first succulent tomatoes of the season."
ins: Combine the tomatoes, avocados, garlic, onion, and cilantro in a large bowl.  Sprinkle with lime juice, and season with salt and pepper. Garnish salad with thin lime slices.
